content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) competed at the [2000 Summer Olympics](/wiki/2000_Summer_Olympics) in [Sydney](/wiki/Sydney), [Australia](/wiki/Australia). ## Results by event ### [Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_2000_Summer_Olympics) Nine men and three women competed in the eight events in the Sailing competition in Sydney. **Men's Double Handed Dinghy (470)** - [Tan Wearn Haw](/wiki/Tan_Wearn_Haw) and [Koh Seng Leong](/wiki/Koh_Seng_Leong) - Race 1 – 24 - Race 2 – 26 - Race 3 – 22 - Race 4 – 23 - Race 5 – 13 - Race 6 – 21 - Race 7 – (30) DNF - Race 8 – 25 - Race 9 – 12 - Race 10 – 26 - Race 11 – (28) - Final – 192 (→ 28th place) **Men's Sailing (Laser) Individual Competition** - [Stanley Tan](/wiki/Stanley_Tan) ### [Shooting](/wiki/Shooting_at_the_2000_Summer_Olympics) **Women's Air Pistol** - [Shirley Ng](/wiki/Shirley_Ng) ### [Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_2000_Summer_Olympics) **Men's 50 m Freestyle** - [Leslie Kwok](/wiki/Leslie_Kwok) - Preliminary Heat – 24.00 (→ did not advance) **Men's 100 m Freestyle** - [Mark Chay](/wiki/Mark_Chay) - Preliminary Heat – 52.24 (→ did not advance) **Men's 200 m Freestyle** - [Mark Chay](/wiki/Mark_Chay) - Preliminary Heat – 1:52.22 (→ did not advance) **Men's 400 m Freestyle** - [Ju Wei Sng](/wiki/Ju_Wei_Sng) - Preliminary Heat – 04:01.34 (→ did not advance) **Men's 100 m Breaststroke** - [Daniel Liew](/wiki/Daniel_Liew) - Preliminary Heat – 01:06.41 (→ did not advance) **Men's 100 m Backstroke** - [Gary Tan](/wiki/Gary_Tan_(swimmer,_born_1982)) - Preliminary Heat – 58.69 (→ did not advance) **Men's 200 m Backstroke** - [Gary Tan](/wiki/Gary_Tan_(swimmer,_born_1982)) - Preliminary Heat – 02:06.32 (→ did not advance) **Women's 50 m Freestyle** - [Joscelin Yeo](/wiki/Joscelin_Yeo) - Preliminary Heat – 26.71 (→ did not advance) **Women's 100 m Freestyle** - [Joscelin Yeo](/wiki/Joscelin_Yeo) - Preliminary Heat – 57.15 (→ did not advance) **Women's 400 m Freestyle** - [Christel Bouvron](/wiki/Christel_Bouvron) - Preliminary Heat – 04:25.16 (→ did not advance) **Women's 100 m Butterfly** - [Joscelin Yeo](/wiki/Joscelin_Yeo) - Preliminary Heat – 01:01.28 (→ did not advance) **Women's 200 m Butterfly** - [Christel Bouvron](/wiki/Christel_Bouvron) - Preliminary Heat – 02:17.62 (→ did not advance) **Women's 100 m Breaststroke** - [Joscelin Yeo](/wiki/Joscelin_Yeo) - Preliminary Heat – 01:13.25 (→ did not advance) **Women's 200 m Breaststroke** - [Nicolette Teo](/wiki/Nicolette_Teo) - Preliminary Heat – 02:37.39 (→ did not advance) **Women's 200 m Individual Medley** - [Joscelin Yeo](/wiki/Joscelin_Yeo) - Preliminary Heat – 02:19.18 (→ did not advance) ### [Table tennis](/wiki/Table_tennis_at_the_2000_Summer_Olympics) **Women's Competition** - [Jing Junhong](/wiki/Jing_Junhong) – 4th place - [Li Jiawei](/wiki/Li_Jiawei) - Official Olympic Reports - sports-reference This [2000 Olympics](/wiki/2000_Summer_Olympics)-related article is a stub. title: Singapore at the 2000 Summer Olympics
